data.title: Great Pizza, Great Sandwiches
data.text: I usually get the Carnivore pizza, which is awesome, but on a recent visit I decided to try a turkey club sandwich. It was fantastic! I loved everything from the roll to the quality of the meat to the condiments. I always knew Smoky Mountain Pizza was the place to go for pizza, but now I know it's also the place to go for a great sandwich!

owner_response.author: SmokyMtnPizza, Director of Food & Beverage at Smoky Mountain Pizzeria Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Scribblin,

Thank you for the great review!  It's nice to hear that you have found out about the great sandwiches, now we just have to get you to check out the new grilled items we rolled out last week!  Thanks again and We look forward to your next visit!

Regards,

Tom Reding
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Food
data.text: This is close to our home and the perfect spot for lunch when doing errands. On the back of the menu are lunch specials with very reasonable prices. We love the pizza/salad combos and especially the Sonoma chicken pasta. We have been there in the evening. Beer and wine available. We will return again soon.

owner_response.author: SmokyMtnPizza, Manager at Smoky Mountain Pizzeria Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi KBSLC,

Thank you for the great feedback, we look forward to your next visit!

Tom Reding
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Kitchen needs help!
data.text:
We arrived and minutes after we sat down the table adjacent to ours complained about the undercooked burger. 5 minutes later the other table sent their food back because the pizza had minimal cheese and it wasn't melted either. 
I felt leary at that point. We waited 25 minutes for appetizers and wouldn't you know our entire dinner came out at once leaving something that we ordered to get cold. The waiter assured us he'd talk to the manager about our bill in lieu of the lack of kitchen time management. 
Our check came and nothing was done to help, of course we paid full price for terrible (kitchen) service and cold food. Sadly this was our anniversary dinner establishment...we won't be returning again!

owner_response.author: SmokyMtnPizza, Manager at Smoky Mountain Pizzeria Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Jared-

Thank you for your feedback and we appreciate your candidness.  I am sorry that there were some communication issues that ultimately had a negative effect on your dining experience.  In an effort to move forward, we will take this up at our Management meetings as well as in pre-shift meetings with the staff.  We certainly hope that we might see you back in again so that we can give you the food and service you deserve.  

Tom Reding
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Amazing Pizza!
data.text: This restaurant is a family favorite.  Very comfortable and clean surroundings and their pizza is amazing!  A perfect location for a dining experience for skiers or hikings coming down off the mountain at the end of  day.

data.title: Great gluten free pizza
data.text: Have eaten here several times now and enjoyed my pizza every time. My son and I both need gluten free so we have several options here. The others in our group enjoyed their food also. Had very good service.

owner_response.author: SmokyMtnPizza, Manager at Smoky Mountain Pizzeria Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Sherry,

Thanks for the great review, we are glad that we are able to accommodate your gluten free needs as well as the rest of the party.  We look forward to your next visit!

Tom Reding
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Everyone in my family loves this place.
data.text: We come here every year during our annual family week at Snowbird during the summer.  I always get the french dip sandwich with curly fries and a Cesar salad with their pink house dressing.  The sandwich is perfect.  The salad dressing is so good we buy it and take it home.  Pizza is also good.  They have a "make your own" kids pizza.  They bring the raw ingredients out on a little artists palette, the kids make the pizza, then they cook it a bring it back.  The younger kids love it.  Everything I have eaten here (we always share plates) is excellent.  Service is always good and we leave full with leftovers.

data.title: Delightful find
data.text: My husband and I spent too much time shopping and were starving by the time we looked for something close to where we were. I'm so glad we chose this restaurant for lunch. We were there at 12:45 and only two other tables were filled. Lacey was our waitress and was very kind and helpful. We were served complimentary appetizers for Valentine's Day. My husband had the calzone and I had the spicy chicken pasta. Both were delicious. I'll be back. Great, timely service and yummy food.

data.title: Food--very good; service--no so good
data.text:
Went on a Friday night around 5 p.m., we were seated quickly and then it took a while to get someone to help us and when they did it was very long between times that we saw her. A couple was placed in the booth next to ours ended up leaving without eating because no one came to their table at all. 
Food was excellent. We tried the Brie kisses, calazone, and personal pizzas and loved them all.

data.title: Mmmmmmm
data.text: The pizza is great. Since all of their pizzas are delicious, I normally order 3-4 of their personal pizzas in different styles - they're all good. They serve beer too, so it's a great place to hang out with friends and family and enjoy the food.

data.title: Wow! Amazing pizza
data.text: Visited this with a local who somehow had no idea it had been here for about 14 years. The staff and service was excellent. They kept telling us how the good the pizza was so I tried not to get my hopes up. I had the carnivore and it was spectacular! I wish there was another location north of Salt Lake. It will be worth the trip back down to Sandy though. Absolutely delicious and a great overall experience.

data.title: Excellent find in Sandy
data.text: I met friends for lunch and was pleasantly surprised.  They have great, creative pizzas but they also have pasta and salads.  It was so good, I came back again later that week to try different things with another friend.  It is nice and casual.  The staff was friendly.

data.title: Poor service, small portions
data.text: My friends and our children visited Smokey Mountain for a quick dinner before a swim outing.  After placing our order, we waited for more than an hour for our food.   We watched multiple parties get seated after us, and receive their food before we did.  No one came to check on us or to explain the delay with our food.  Finally, one member in our party complained to an employee.  This employee came to our table and simply said "sorry, your food should be out shortly."  No offer to assist in any way. When the server eventually brought our food, she simply said "sorry, our kitchen was backed up."  I'm still wondering why many of the groups who came in after we did, received their food long before we did.  We did have seven in our party, but nobody ordered anything extraordinary.  We ended up canceling our swimming plans.  By the time we got out of the restaurant, the pool was closed.

data.title: Happily Surprised
data.text: This is so much more than pizza. The delivery service is fantastic. I have ordered from them multiple times, and my order has always been accurate and delivered sooner then expected. The pollo san marcos is served with grilled romaine hearts and the entire dish is delightful. I love having great healthy choices that are more than just pizza.

data.title: Surprise! More Than Pizza Is Good Here!
data.text: Smokey Mountain Pizza serves something they call the "Carnivore," which is one of the best pizzas anywhere. I always order that, but for a change of pace, I ordered the "Trail Creek Burger." I'm a burger guy, and I have certain expectations. This burger is FANTASTIC! It must be at least 1/3 of a pound, served on a terrific roll (potato bread, maybe?), with sweet barbecue sauce, cheddar cheese, and onion rings on the burger. Wow, it was great. Now I'm torn: Which do I order, the pizza or the burger? Maybe both? Service is great. Prices are reasonable. You really need to try this place.

data.title: Have you ever had Brie Kisses?
data.text: Neither had we until we visited the Smoky Mountain Pizzeria!  Our waiter suggested that we try the brie kisses; they were these yummy little pastry bites with a small amount of brie cheese melted inside.  Yummy!  They had a nice menu of pizza selections, being the creative cooks that we both are we opted to create our own pizza.  It was delicious.  Had we found this restaurant earlier in our trip we would have visited again, for sure!

owner_response.author: SmokyMtnPizza, Director of Food & Beverage at Smoky Mountain Pizzeria Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Travelinggrandma54-

We are happy you found us on your trip this time around and we look forward to seeing you next time you are in town!  Safe Travels!

Tom Reding
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: One of the Best in the Valley
data.text: On my first visit to Smokey Mountain Pizza, I ordered a "carnivore" pizza and it was fantastic. There are several meats on the pizza, including applewood bacon. Not just regular bacon, which would be great. Applewood bacon. I've been back two more times within about 10 days. I'd love to try other things on the menu -- eventually -- but the carnivore is SO good. You have to try it!

data.title: Yeah for gluten free pizza
data.text: Once again we visited here & enjoyed our food again. Love the view of the mountains. I do not have any pizzerias in my area that serve gluten free pizza so this is a real treat. Everyone enjoyed their food.

data.title: Amongst the best of pizzas in the valley
data.text: Nice warm cozy and easily accessible. Friendly staff and great choice of food.  Reasonably priced and value for money

data.title: BEST PIZZA EVER
data.text: Great Italian (and American) food. We try to eat there at least once a week. M.Ray and Josh always go to extra effort to please. If you have a problem, they are eager to fix it. Friendly and attentive service at a fair price.

owner_response.author: SmokyMtnPizza, Director of Food & Beverage at Smoky Mountain Pizzeria Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Steve,

Thanks for the great feedback, It is really nice to hear that the crew is doing such a great job!  Take care, and come back soon!

Tom Reding
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Pasta
data.text: I love the Chicken Fettuccine Alfredo.  The servings come in two sizes.  I got the large; and, yet, practically licked the plate clean.  I was soooooo good.

owner_response.author: SmokyMtnPizza, Director of Food & Beverage at Smoky Mountain Pizzeria Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Leo,

Thanks for the great review!  I too am a big fan of the Alfredo.  We make it from scratch for each order it really does hit the spot!  We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Tom Reding
owner_response.title: Owner Response
